sourcesContent: import { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import Prism from 'prismjs' import BreadCrumbs from '@Components/breadcrumbs' import Card from '@Components/card-snippet' import SpinnerBorder from './SpinnerBorder' import SpinnerColors from './SpinnerColors' import SpinnerGrow from './SpinnerGrowing' import SpinnerGrowColors from './SpinnerGrowingColored' import SpinnerFlex from './SpinnerFlex' import SpinnerFloat from './SpinnerFloat' import SpinnerTextAlignment from './SpinnerTextAlignment' import SpinnerSizes from './SpinnerSizes' import SpinnerButtons from './SpinnerButtons' import { spinnerBorder, spinnerButton, spinnerColors, spinnerFlex, spinnerFloat, spinnerGrowColors, spinnerGrowing, spinnerSizes, spinnerTextAlignment } from './SpinnerSourceCode' const Spinners = () => { useEffect(() => { Prism.highlightAll() }, []) return ( Use Spinner tag to create a bordered spinner. Use color attribute to create a colored spinner. Use type="grow" with spinner tag to create a growing spinner. Use color and type attribute to create a colored growing spinner. Use Flexbox utilities to place spinners.Use .d-flex and .justify-content-[side]. Use .float-[side] with spinner tag to change spinner's position. You can also use .text-[side] as a wrapper to spinner tag to change spinner's position. Use prop size="sm" for Small spinner or use style prop for custom size. ) } export default Spinners
